snippet: “Orange, Red, Yellow,” a 1961 canvas by Mark Rothko, sold for nearly $87 million, and prices for artists like Pollock also brought record amounts.
abstract: Mark Rothko painting brings in nearly $87 million at Christie's, shattering all auction records for contemporary art.
lead_paragraph: “Orange, Red, Yellow,” a 1961 canvas by Mark Rothko, sold for nearly $87 million, and prices for artists like Pollock also brought record amounts.

headline.seo: Rothko Painting Sells for Record, Nearly $87 Million, at Christie’s
headline.main: Record Sales for a Rothko and Other Art at Christie’s
headline.print_headline: Rothko Painting ($87 Million) and Other Art Bring Record Sales at Christie’s
